data.lyric:
[ti:Higher Love]
[ar:Kygo/Whitney Houston]
[al:Higher Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Higher Love - Kygo (凯戈)/Whitney Houston
[00:03.07]Lyrics by：Steve Winwood/Will Jennings
[00:06.15]Composed by：Steve Winwood/Will Jennings
[00:09.23]Think about it
[00:11.32]There must be higher love
[00:13.94]Down in the heart or hidden in the stars above
[00:18.40]Without it life is wasted time
[00:23.13]Look inside your heart and I look inside mine
[00:28.39]Things look so bad everywhere
[00:32.86]In this whole world what is fair
[00:37.43]We will walk the line and try to see
[00:42.09]Falling behind in what could be
[00:46.66]Bring me a higher love
[00:50.89]Bring me a higher love
[00:55.78]Bring me a higher love
[00:59.90]Where's that higher love
[01:02.19]I keep thinking of
[01:07.24]Bring me a higher love love
[01:11.59]Bring me a higher love
[01:16.28]Bring me a higher love love
[01:20.86]Bring me a higher love
[01:25.36]Bring me a higher love love
[01:29.94]Bring me a higher love
[01:34.52]Bring me a higher love love
[01:39.17]Bring me a higher love
[01:43.68]Worlds are turning
[01:45.85]And we're just hanging on
[01:48.42]Facing our fear and standing out there alone
[01:53.19]A yearning and it's real to me
[01:57.67]There must be someone who's feeling for me
[02:03.11]Things look so bad everywhere
[02:07.51]In this whole world what is fair
[02:11.92]We will walk the line and try to see
[02:16.66]Falling behind in what could be
[02:21.46]Bring me a higher love
[02:25.42]Bring me a higher love
[02:30.65]Bring me a higher love
[02:34.37]Where's that higher love
[02:36.77]I keep thinking of
[02:41.48]Bring me a higher love love
[02:46.10]Bring me a higher love
[02:50.72]Bring me a higher love love
[02:55.32]Bring me a higher love
[02:58.43]Bring me a higher love
[03:02.49]Bring me a higher love
[03:07.14]Bring me a higher love
[03:09.88]Bring me bring me a higher love love
[03:13.49]I keep thinking of
[03:17.03]Bring me a higher love love
[03:20.88]Bring me a higher love
[03:26.61]Bring me a higher love love
[03:30.68]A higher love
[03:32.12]I keep thinking of
[03:35.04]Bring me a higher love
[03:39.27]Bring me a higher love
data.trans:
[ti:Higher Love]
[ar:Kygo/Whitney Houston]
[al:Higher Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.07]//
[00:06.15]//
[00:09.23]想想看
[00:11.32]这世界一定有伟大的爱
[00:13.94]或藏于心底 或隐于繁星间
[00:18.40]没有它 生命也将毫无意义
[00:23.13]审视彼此的内心
[00:28.39]这世界有太多的不堪
[00:32.86]这世界有太多的不公
[00:37.43]我们仍会一往无前 试着看清
[00:42.09]未来会有怎样的可能会发生
[00:46.66]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[00:50.89]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[00:55.78]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[00:59.90]何处能觅得伟大爱情？
[01:02.19]我一直在幻想
[01:07.24]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:11.59]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:16.28]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:20.86]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:25.36]就给我无与伦比的爱吧

[01:34.52]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:39.17]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
[01:43.68]世界变幻莫测
[01:45.85]我们只是徘徊等待
[01:48.42]独自面对心底的恐惧
[01:53.19]那份渴望 对我来说是那么的真切
[01:57.67]这世界一定有人会与我感同身受吧
[02:03.11]这世界有太多的不堪
[02:07.51]这世界有太多的不公
[02:11.92]我们仍会一往无前 试着看清
[02:16.66]未来会有怎样的可能会发生
[02:21.46]就给我无与伦比的爱吧
